content.detailedDescription:
This event took place on september 24th 2013 heading west on arapahoe rd .My girlfriend observed the hoovering of a disc like object in a southwest direction towards the mountains at approximately 6:50pm. what struck my curiosity is that the object did not move or have sound. it didn't appear to be a plane or anything i could describe. we we're driving in the direction of the sun however,we could see a plane moving at the same time considering we were close to centennial airport. i quickly grabbed my phone and took two pictures then the object vanished without trace.. the pictures will be enclosed .. please examine them and maybe you can tell me what i saw.. this will is  exciting for me to find out if in deed i had an encounter with a ufo... since we are being kept in the dark about the true knowledge and existence of extra terrestrial life.. if u find this to be a true encounter please share this with everyone and anyone...
thank you !!!!
content.summary: Driving west on arapahoe rd in centennial co. we observed a disc like object hoovering .

content.detailedDescription: I was in century city, los angeles. the time was 12:13am. my boyfriend and i were just beginning to drive home when we came to a stoplight. we first observed two blinking lights in the sky; red and white. at first it seemed to look like a airplane, with its white and red flashing lights but what seemed unusual was the pattern of the blinking. it was at least a mile away but was in the range of eye level to treetops and power lines. it began to rise altitude and speed. as it picked up speed, it descended about 3 inches from my field of vision and ascended quickly back to it's original altitude.   we decided to follow it by car in a span of 4 minutes. it was moving west towards the orion's belt constellation. it was moving so fast that we could not keep up with the flying object. as it moved farther away, the red light was no longer visible but only the white light. after my boyfriend dropped me off at my home, he was driving back home and observed an airplane and tested if you could keep up with it. he was able to and concluded the aircraft we witnessed was not a airplane.
content.summary: Midnight sighting over century city, los angeles. flew faster than a airplane!

content.detailedDescription: December 15,2013 approximate time 5:00p.M. i was driving back home to alvin,texas from visiting my daughter and grandchildren near beaumont, texas. i took i-10 to beltway-8 south,then south on i-45 and exited dixie farm rd. driving southwest on dixie farm rd i was coming up to beamer rd traffic light and seen this very bright spot above the clouds and reflections of objects moving and fading out.I looked to the right to see if the person in the car next to me was seeing this,she was busy texting.I looked at the van in front of me and could see in his side mirror he was talking on his phone. all during this time i was getting my work cell phone in camera mode. i took one photo with all three objects in view. then as i was taking another photo,one of the objects faded out,the other object dropped down quickly and as i snapped the picture a greyish triangle object quickly appears and fades out of my view.I continually keep looking around to see if anyone else was seeing this.The traffic light turned green and the only thing still visible was this bright glowing spot.
content.summary: Very bright object with various shaped objects moving in surrounding area

content.detailedDescription:
Never seen anything like this and it is driving me crazy... someone else must have seen this.
i was driving down cedar lake road going east when i noticed a really bright star. when i looked closer i realized there was a bunch of very bright stars - almost in a constellation like form - then i realized they were moving.
i pulled over to the side of the road and watched as they moved slowly across the sky. the ones on the leading edge began to disappear one by one followed by the rest.  soon there were no lights to be seen.

my feelings:  this has got to be something - someone else had to have seen this - what the heck was it???
content.summary: Very bright star-like lights moving across sky - looked like constellations

content.detailedDescription:
So me and my boyfriend were driving down the the highway when i saw two hovering black disk's out the passenger window. i told my boyfriend to look and he grabbed a series of pictures showing the objects stading still in the sky (hovering). they were circular and had no lights. we took the next exit and headed towards where we saw them. we had lost them in the trees after taking the exit and by the time we reached the area they were previously above, they were gone. we also saw a helicopter heading in the same direction as we drove closer. this occured at roughly 5:30pm in rhode island.

the photos are in order, the first photo was taken with the windows rolled up which accounts for the huge glare. the following pictures 2-5 were taken with the window rolled down. the last photo is zoomed in.
content.summary: Saw two hovering black disk's, no lights. went to get closer and they dissapeared in the tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
it was monday morning as i need to open gate for the trash man, i looked east and it was a clear sky accept this thunder head cloud.
 i saw a light catch my eye it was above this thunder head like sitting right on top figured it was a plane reflecting the sun off its belly, the sun was behind the cloud.
 as i was walking back to go inside i looked again and a second popped out from first one,thought to my self that's funny by that time i was inside and asked my co workers to see what i was seeing it was 3 males 1 female.
 as we where looking and my eyes focused i saw 1 big , 2 medium and 5 small ones by that time cloud was dispersing, the sun was starting to come over top of cloud the big made a turn and swam in the air like a snake or worm my heart sank to my stomach and was in awe what i was seeing.
 later that day my moms boss said he saw one 100ft in air travel along i20 west in a blink of an eye was gone.
content.summary: Snake like, worm like , ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I am now 80 years old but this is something that occurred when i a young child but is something i think should be reported while i am still alive. it happened during the summer following an afternoon thunder storm. it may have happened as late as the summer of 1941 but probably in the late 1930s. location observed was from the northeast shore of bryant long lake which is located in the northern portion of what is now the city of eden prairie but then was a township. eden prairie is a second tier suburb southwest of minneapolis, minn. 
after the thunder storm passed & the sun came out, i remember running outside to see the rainbow but instead saw a multitude of straight laser like lines of various colors against a very dark stormy northeast sky. i ran inside our home to tell my mother asking what they were & she said they were the reflection of street lights & traffic lights from minneapolis. however i never saw anything like that prior to that or at anytime since then. i don't think laser was invented until well after ww2. this was not a ufo, i think, but something i have never seen again in my life & in retrospect do not think my mother was correct but gave me the most logical explination she could think of. 
you asked a number of questions in your check list which i don't think i could accuratly answer. the month, day, & year are just a guess.
content.summary: Nummerous laser lights observed in the late 1930s  before laser was invented

content.detailedDescription:
I lost sight a few times because of trees but kept a steady eye have always been interested in the stars planets ect. and knew that there wasn't supposed to be a star in the middle of the big dipper very small at first but as we where going thru the mountains began to grow larger in diameter when we were on the flats i convinced my dad to pull over and check it out my father was a amatuer fotoghafer(mis spelled)should have spell check on this 
when we stopped got out my father , grandmother , brother and me saw in the middle of the big dipper a white glowing light the size was unbelievable if you wre to say that the dipper was 4"by 4" rectangle this disc of light was   
2.5"in diameter huge when a black dot appeared in the center and litteralry
hundreds of smaller craft came out and went in ever direction including one that went right over our heads my grand mother at that time was almost 80 dove into the car which was 1957 chevrolet which she bought new let out a big scared the crap out her 
in about 30 minutes all those craft went back into there main ship the black hole disapeared and that huge disc started to get smaller at about the same speed that it got bigger 
i concluded from this that it came from out side our atmosphere and continuted on the same heading into our atmosphere the ufo that passed over us at an alttutuded of aprox. 200ft. was egg shaped and approx. 3o ft. from front to back it was very fast at that time i was into cars and racing a lot this craft was traveling at about 1000 miles per hr. est.
my das name is  virgil daniel hopkins
granmother      francis hopkins
brother         ronald dean hopkins
my name         daniel wayne hopkins
my dad took pictures from 4 different cameras he was a truck driver for a living use to (as it was called sleeping over the wheel)couple hours sleep keep going
we woke up the next morning several miles away everybody sound asleep all film was black when tried to develope it was light out side when we woke
remember this started no later than 10 at night the night before

i would like to no if any other reportings happened around that time sorry it took so long don't care about crazy this happened wasn't us!!!                     
                4
content.summary: Small star observed in the middle of the big dipper as we went thru the blue mountains

content.detailedDescription: Picture identification. help me out! i am uploading a picture i found on my camera. i didn't see or hear anything until i downloaded my photos from the moon shots i took tonight 1-31-14. pretty cool!
content.summary: Picture identification. i am uploading a picture i found on my film. i didn't see or hear anything until i put them on my computer.

content.detailedDescription: I opened the back door to let the dog out and saw 2 or 3 orange lights coming towards the house.  they hovered, and changed direction.  then they seemed to ascend very very fast and just disappeared from the sky.  i thought perhaps someone was testing drones.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: A few spherical orange glowing lights flew in formation west to east then ascended straight up & disappeared

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
I was pulling up in my car to drive in my driveway.  i live on a cul de sac
and before i made the turn in my garage i saw the lights.  there were i would say 25 at least they were red and a little orange.  the were horizontal but in a curve.  when i first saw them they had a bunch lined up going up in the sky but with a slight curve there were some sort of light fibers it looked like going out to about 4 on each side staggered. i called from my cell for my husband to come out there were about 18 left but the light fibers were gone.  he called our 13 year old son out to observe too.  the were going up and disappearing one by one but a couple of new ones appeared. then they were gone into the clouds.  we went in the house for about 20 minutes and i went and my husband also to pull my car into the garage and there were two more spaced out.  one of the first ones and one of the second broke into two circles and went apart and then they came back together. om the question degrees above horizon we were not sure they kept popping up new ones and the top ones were high but not higher than the clouds then they just kept going higher till we couldn't see them anymore both times
content.summary: Red and slightly orange colored circles

content.detailedDescription:
I went out to get the paper around 6:00 am. i looked across the nearby highway overpass and saw a red-orange object that looked like a paper-lantern. it was approximately one-half mile away over the applegate post office area. i wobbled as it flew in a wnw direction across i-80 toward my neighborhood. there was a re-orange glow emanating from the rear of the object that lit up the low overhead cloud cover. my impression was that it was small plane on fire (there is an airport a few miles away). 
it made no sound. the object slowed, started to turn south and began ascending slowly. it finally occurred me to get my phone and get some video. but by then, the object was about one mile away and had risen to about 1000 ft above the i-80 roadway. as it flew away, it continued to emit the re-orange light.
content.summary: Red-orange wobbly object, like a large paper-lantern. emitted light from behind onto clouds above.

content.detailedDescription: Approx. time was 10:30pm mid-late november. fairly clear sky with some clouds. i usually step out in the late fall evenings to have a cigar and watch for "shooting stars". we get a lot of north to south air traffic heading to detroit metro airport but their fairly low on approach and loud in our area. we also have a local airport about 3 miles north east of us in troy, mi and that airport has a lot of news helicopter traffic. i was on the back porch of my hose which faces due south and coming from the west i noticed an outline of what appeared to be a very large, fast moving hourglass shaped object. at first i thought i got lucky and spotted the international space station passing over. once i quickly realized that the object was below the clouds, i tried to scale its size by looking at surrounding objects (i am an industrial model maker and have a very strong sense of scale and object size relation). the object never changed direction and continued east til out of sight. i remember thinking "this is very strange, it made no sound approaching and no sound as it passed and it is clearly below the clouds". it was 100% hourglass shaped, illuminated around the edges and the negative space within those edges was a very faint hazy glow. i got in my car to see if i could follow but the object was out of sight. i was a bit confused by what i saw. put up a post on cragslist that night but nobody else mentioned seeing anything like it. someone joked that it was the grim reaper. not my first time seeing something odd in the sky in michigan but this was by far the closest.
content.summary: Very large, noiseless, hourglass shaped object below clouds

content.detailedDescription: I was outside tonight at 8:03 pm in newark, ca. looking at the western sky. i was watching jets coming in for a landing at sfo, and something strange caught my eye. it is hard to describe. it was an object of unknown shape (like paint spatter shape), fairly large the size of the jets coming in for a landing. it was traveling east at a speed faster than the approaching planes. against the night sky, it was a light grey transparent color (like a cloud) without any lights or sound. i could not distinguish how high it was because i was looking at it against the night sky, but it appeared to be as high as the approaching jets. it was in very close proximity to one jet as it approached westward. after it passed in front of the path of the jet,  it proceeded to the east and seemed to just disappear or the best way to describe it; it faded out. i do not notice cloud cover, but it disappeared as an object would when it travels above or into the clouds.
content.summary: Unidentified transparent object over newark. ca

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
Ii watched for several minutes. went home. about four people to my neighbor, pointing up iwe saw them above our houses.
i realized that our homes have electrical lines on the hillsides. i called moffet field. they could not help me. i had no knowledge of mufon in 1982. i will never forget what i saw. i still see it as though it was yesterday. saw several spheres and one larger sphere moving in the sky. 
one was yellow,red,and oronge. some spheres moved in and out of the larger sphere
content.summary: 1 large glowing there. 20 plus silver white smaller wheres moving over north to south.

content.detailedDescription:
At the time i was driving, so i might have missed something, but here it goes:

i was driving home from work around 7h10-7h15, and i glanced over across the road just because (i honestly don't know why i looked over). i first noticed the object hovering in an area that doesn't have any power lines, cell towers, etc. to set up a formation of lights. i thought it might have  been a helicopter at first, as there were two red lights towards the top (like where the tail of a helicopter would come up) and three white lights. as i watched, swapping back and forth from the road to the side, the object started meandering away so that it was moving perpendicular to the road i was driving on (i was driving into town, so the object was moving to the left away from me). the object revealed it had four white lights in a diamond shape (closer to a kite's shape than an equal diamond) with the two side lights blinking (just white) regularly. there were also two red lights in the centre of the object (i don't know if these were the same ones that i saw initially, but it seemed to me that it was a different set). i kept watching as it got farther away, and, when i looked away for a moment and looked back, it was gone - possibly due to trees obscuring the view or something else; i expect the trees got in the way, though; the movements were not at all hasty.

during the viewing, i was excited and curious. i wanted to follow it, but there was no direct road to it, and, by the time i decided that it was a good idea to look into it, i'd lost sight of it and would have still had to wait to find a road for a little while to turn around and get over to the other side.

i wish i could be more specific, but it was hard to make any solid notes while driving.
content.summary: Diamond shape of white lights.

content.detailedDescription: In 1962, at approx 5:15pm during daylight in either april or may and after we finished dinner, i went outside our house to get the newspaper.  as i pick it up from the sidewalk and began to walk back into the house, i felt a sudden urge (perhaps from hearing a whoosh/swish of disturbed air), i looked up and to the northeast observing a large, silent satin black pylon shaped rectangular slow (15-20mph)"flying" unknown craft.  instead of running to get a camera, i stayed to observe and mentally record details.  i was actually more amazed with the flawless manufacture or perfection of the vehicle than the fact it was silent and flying.  it did not display lights and i didnt see any lines to indicate openings for doors, landing legs, ramps etc.  there were 3 "windows" approx. 2-3ft in diameter on the south side which was my vantage point. looking thru them, i saw a dark amber lighting deep inside the vehicle.  nothing/no one appeared in view. the edges of the vehicle were not 90 degrees sharp.  they were very slightly rounded.  the approx. dimensions of the black box were 60 feet long by 25 feet wide by 5-5.5ft high.  i remember thinking that short people must be inside.  the front and back sides were about 70-80 degrees slanted, making the bottom longer and the top shorter.  it was a satin black all around, not gloss or dull/flat. thinking it strange that since all airplanes were silver, this black vehicle must be from ft riley or perhaps wichita. i was afraid but then relaxed as it traveled from east to west and left my view.  even though i was only 12 yo at the time, my talent for artistic detail has enabled me to permanently remember the experience.  i couldnt forget it even if i tried for the rest of my life.
content.summary: The flawless black rectangular craft silently flew at low altitude over our field

content.detailedDescription: Both me and my girlfriend observed this bright light on the eastern horizon.We were looking out my window facing east where the sun comes up. it was stationary for a least the half hour we noticed it and then started moving very slowly.My girlfriend also observed it driving to work.Iwatched it slowly moving upward aftermy girlfriend left for work. she saw it when driving by the haddam landfill.I stopped watching it around 6 am.Next morning my girlfriend saw 6 lights (in one line)in the same area.
content.summary: Two people saw a bright light on the eastern horizon between 5 and 6am. light was stationary for at least 30 minutes and then slowly drifted upward on a angle. next morning observed 6 lights in same location at same time.

content.detailedDescription:
My first of a number of encounters spanning from 1968 to 1978 began in my home town of wayland, massachusetts i was walking along the nearby railroad line. the work of stringing of high voltage power lines were strung up on towers and were now active. a short time after the power lines became active ufos began showing up regularly. the first one i ever saw was a saucer boomerang shape. the center was rounded but it had like wings which caused the craft to be of a boomerang shape. the craft dropped out of the sky near the town line near the line with the next neighboring town to the west, sudbury. >it stopped over a raytheon facility, then continued eastward. when it got down to where i was standing in the middle of the tracks, it stopped over me. there was a westbound freight train coming out of boston, suddenly stopped dead. the rr crossing lights went out. the buzzing of the new power lines stopped. all electricity ceased. panicked i turned and ran down the embankment of the rr line over the fence across a neighbors field to my home apple orchard. the craft turned and followed me slowly and stopped above me again, it turned an east northeast direction and slowly proceeded over the woods to where a new development was being built. it stopped hovered, then took off really fast like a helicopter take off and disappeared very, very quickly, gone from sight in about two seconds. 

within a month the neighborhood began witnessing dozens of visitations usually between 3:00 pm to 5:00 pm. it was at that time i was abducted from my bedroom late at night. that happened i would guess maybe 6 times there, and several times out at my stepfather's family farm in sheffield, massachusetts. 

i do not know exactly when, but i discovered  during x-rays, that some kind of implants were put within my body. i have undergone 5 surgeries having them removed from my left arm, the back of my neck, my chest, my nose and my right arm.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: First contact was 1968, over power lines beside the railroad line

content.detailedDescription:
Looking outside of my bedroom window one morning , i saw what i can only describe as a silver gray colored orb, which was flying above my house and continuing on east, towards a mountain ridge, near harper's ferry, west virginia.
   it was a vehicle i saw before, which was flying close to the tail section of a jumbo jet (747) in a different area several years ago (5 years ago).
 the object seemed to be flying without a trail or any vapor, which would be self- propelled, and silent, flying straight line, and not too fast, (under 50 mph)i saw it for about four minutes until it disappeared somewhere near the appalachians.After consultaion with a state sst director of mufon, we agreed it was a un-manned alien probe, or a black project drone, which is hard to see on a clear or cloudy day. after i saw the report form the uk about the pilot of the a320 jet who saw the same type of f.O. i had to make a report. the only difference between the sightings is the altitude, and speed of the object. this is the second time i have seen this object over a 6 year timespan.I have seen other reports of a slivery orb type object,
and one you tube video which looks exactly like what i saw.
bp
content.summary: Silvery orb flies over roof as i looked out over 2nd floor bedroom

content.detailedDescription:
I was with my cousin and my two kids. we were coming back from the beach. my cousin decided to take a short cut so he made a rt turn. the name of the road or street is las marias. i don't know if it belongs to a town named aguada or a���asco, puerto rico. i am sitting on the passenger seat on front. i noticed this shiny gold round object just floating in the sky. it didn't move. i try to call the attention of my cousin but he was fooling around with my kids. then, i didn't hear anything else, but a thought that came in my head, ( i think ) , it just said; ' hay esperanza para la humanidad'.' ( ' there is hope for humanity' ). i just felt peace in that moment. i wasn't scare. i felt good, full of tranquility.  when i was going to talk to my family, i so that it was getting longer and a white smoke was appearing in front of it. i didn't want to miss anything so i kept on looking and when it took off, it disappeared. i thought that it was going to go straight, but i didn't see it. it was gone. i told my cousin, but he look at me like, yeah, right. the following day i went to work and stop to get breakfast. i grab the paper and shocking surprise, there was a black and white photo of what i saw. it was lovely. i felt so happy to know that it was real. what i saw, was real. 
i really don't know how long after that this other thing happen. i turn on the tv and started to watch a movie where this couple were going to be abducted and i started shaking in a ridiculous way and jump off the bed and turn slam the tv off. i ran to my bed and covered myself from head to toe and didn't stop shaking for a while. i was asking myself what was wrong with me. this is not normal. after that, i don't know if it was a dream, ( but it has haunted me always ), i have seen myself in a gray place or room, i don't know. it looked like metal. i look to my left and i see a white light under what it appears to be a door. i hear myself scream asking them not to hurt my daughter. to leave her alone. i don't know how long after this i found a mark on my left shoulder, close to my neck that i never felt before. it was there for years and it has been for about a year or two that i touch the area and it is gone. was this a dream? how can i know? it still bothers me not knowing. i can not explain it. is there a way of knowing? i always look to the sky at night just to see if i can see and find an answer.
content.summary: At first i thought it was round and shiny gold.

content.detailedDescription:
As reported to asd by phone: 

i am a retired air force pilot and retired commercial pilot. i called this in because i do not want my name made public, but the event is so strange that i felt that someone should know about it. i was traveling home with my wife on highway 152 near liberty, mo after a new year party when we both noticed a large chevron shaped craft to the nw of our position that was very low and appeared to be hoovering. 
  the craft was stationary and almost completely sideways, meaning that we saw the top or bottom of the craft as the wing portions were pointing almost directly vertical. it was similar in shape to the stealth bomber but had elongated wings that bent back towards the rear. the craft was a dark grey or black color and has rounded edges along all of the sides. there were yellow/gold dull lights on the tips of the wings, which brightened and dulled several times. i saw no red or green lights on the craft, which indicates that it was not a conventional aircraft. i began to slow down because i was concerned. the craft moved only slightly as it hoovered. my wife asked me what it could be but i had no explanation. then the object disappeared and reappeared almost instantly (1 second) closer to us, only approximately 60' ahead of us and 30' to the side of the road. there were no other cars on the road at the time which i found odd given that it was new years eve. my wife and i only had one glass of wine earlier in the evening so were not under the influence of alcohol.
  what happened next i cannot explain and have been wrestling with this since the event occurred.  we were suddenly driving down our own street which is three miles from where we saw the craft and it was an hour later! i do not have any recollection as to how we got from the highway to our street nor what happened for an hour when we should have been home within a few minutes. we both felt very tired suddenly and went directly to bed, then woke up very late the next day at around 1:00 p.M. which is not normal for either of us as we are early risers. we went about our business as usual that day, but later that night while watching television my wife asked me if i remembered seeing that strange craft last night and i suddenly remembered the event. this entire thing concerns me greatly and i'm confused about what we saw, and what happened to us during the hour of missing time. i have not spoken to anyone i know about it but needed to talk to someone and that is why i called because it has been weighing heavily on my mind. i would like to know if this has happened to anyone else.
content.summary: Dark hoovering chevron shaped craft near highway first 150' then blinked out and was 60' from us

content.detailedDescription: I was 15yrs. old on my way home from a friend house,in 1984,i was riding my mopad home and i was coming up rawsonville rd. heading home.When my bike just cut off i look down to see what was going on and i tryed to start it while i was still moving but it wouldnt start.Then i notice all these cars pulled over on the side of the road and as i looked at the cars i stopped and looked all the way up till i noticed a dark very hugh disk shape object hoovering over the street light about 15ft. above the street light with different color lights going around it.Blocking out the sunset and casing a shadow over the entire road right over rawsonville rd. and huron river drive,right where it turn into texttile rd.I have never been more afraid in my life. i watched it for a couple minutes and then it took off toward the east so fast i couldnt believe it. i mean as quick as you could blink your eye it was gone...I notice a trail fell off what look like spakle falling to ground but they landed over the woods that was there 30yrs. a go now there is some auto shop.The area is different now but after the ufo left my bike started right up i spoke with a few people who was pulled over but never got a name or anything.I hurried home and told my mother who laughed at me along with my friends.I was so angry i called belleville police station that day and spoke to some lady officer,i told her what i saw and she told me she been getting lots of calls tonight and can tell me what i saw was a helicopter.I was so upset i never talked about it again.
content.summary: It hoovered  over a street light for a couple minutes then flew away so fast you would not believe.

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were walking our dogs in a deserted area of marana called jackson flats.  the time was 7:20 pm, and it was dark.  we were walking north on a dirt road and we both noticed some unusual lights at about the same time.  there appeared to be two separate lines of lights, amber colored and moving slowly.  the stadium lights of marana high school were on and the amber lights appeared to be to the north and further away than the stadium lights, which were about 3 miles from us.  the two separate sets of amber lights were in a line or gentle arc, and each of the two sets consisted of three or more lights.  the lights were not especially bright.  one set stayed horizontal, and the other set tilted about 45 degrees.  the lights were circular, and went off and reappeared, though this may have had something to do with clouds.  the lights were on for less than 30 seconds, then went off and stayed off.

there were one or two other aircraft in the area, and their lights were distinctly different than the amber lights.  

there was no sound.
content.summary: Two objects, each withmultiple lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was visiting my in-laws in california in the san fernando valley about 1/2 mile east of the 118fwy and sepulveda blvd. directly behind hammer toyota when i saw three lights hovering over my location to the east.  

it was christmas eve at approximately 10:40pm when i stepped out of the mobile home where we were at. it was a clear starry night about 40-50 degrees. 
i was leaning on a parked car looking at the stars when i saw three white lights in a triangular formation.  at first i thought they were sea gulls or white owls flying south, but the formation remained the same no matter how it moved.  the triangular form did not change size, so it couldn't have been birds, they looked more like ghosts, plus they glowed.  there was no sound whatsoever.  the lights were solid with a tint of glow, almost like what some would say "a ghost-like glow".  i was hoping the object would go in front of a star so i could determine if it was solid or not, but id did not happen.  i compared it to the stars in the background and the stars were a sharp in contrast, but the object lights were clear but translucent or glowing (hard to describe).  it flowed through the sky from east of my location towards the los angeles area within 3-5 minutes.  it was not speeding but a slow hover.  i've seen picture of the tr-3b astra and there's a possibility that, that's what i saw. i did not think it was extraterrestrial, but perhaps u.S. made craft.  who knows??
content.summary: Triangular ufo with white lights on each corner.

content.detailedDescription: My family and i were headed south on eagle rd when i saw what i thought was a meteor with two tails when it suddenly shifted directions and disappeared.  my wife and children saw the object also.
content.summary: I saw what i thought was a meteorite till it changed direction suddenly and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: We were bbqing when gus ( one of three witnesses ) noticed a bright light appear in the sky nw of us. we sat and watched it for approximately 1 minutes go from left to right a few times then stop and hover. i made a joke " wave at the aliens " and immediately after that it descended rapidly to the ground. we ran to get our phones and when we came back out it was doing some crazy zig zagging. the rest is on video. there are two other phones that recorded it but my phone got the best footage. 100% not a plane or helicopter or ballon. this was something else. sorry about the commentary but we were excited and freaked out.
content.summary: Bright flashing light came rapidly from the nw , zig zagged around , the hovered and descended.  twice.

content.detailedDescription: I was sleeping and i woke up around 4:45 am. i had a weird feeling i should look out my bedroom window. i saw a light in the sky and at first i thought it was a plane or a star but then it disappeared and then reappeared and i knew it wasn't. i took video and pictures of it and it had blue and red blinking lights in the video when i zoomed in. it was just hovering there. i got video and picture of the ufo and noticed it had changed location when i looked at it again. i was scared. the ufo disappeared and i never saw it again.
content.summary: The ufo kept disappearing and then reappearing.

content.detailedDescription: Have video and still photes of event. detailed phone
content.summary: Orbs appeared from sw hovered for two minutes then twenty minutes later a repeat observance. have still and video
